inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of Primary Central Nervous System Lymphoma
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: confirmed histopathologic diagnosis by National Cancer Institute (NCI) Laboratory of Pathology

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance less than or equal to 0-4
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand and willing to provide informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior therapy for central nervous system (CNS) lymphoma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of lymphoma outside of the central nervous system
exclusion.label: unknown
